text: hotel e organizado ,limpo,funcionarios ,prestativos e simpaticos...independente da lingua,quato onde fiquei tinha um tamanho ideal pra 3 pessoas,e tmbm era limpo e sem problemas  ,tinha vista pra rua,achei que o barulho iria incomodar mas  estamos em nova york,tem uma sirene a cada 5 seg  na rua heheh, no segundo dia eu ja tinha me adaptado,o hotel nao tem cafe da manha mas tem uma area no terreo que serve cafe e comida em horarios especificos,o unico porem e que  percebi era que o servico de quarto nao era feito apenas nas camas e toalhas,mas nao era recolocado papel no banheiro ou sabonetes e tal...eu tive de solicitar pessoalmente essas coisas,nao sei se isso e normal ou nao,mas sempre que solicitei fui atendido rapidamente ate no dia emq ue minha ficha trancou o banheiro por dentro  heheh,outro ponto interessante e que,no check-out o hotel se dispoe a guardar suas malas no deposito  enquanto vc passeia mais uma ultima vez pela cidade  sem custo algum,wi fi era bom,localizacao perfeita,perto de tudo e do metro ate.....olha realmente posso dizer que foi um dos melhores hoteis em que estive e volto com certeza

title: Its a nice hotel
text: Its a nice hotel but with better views.  Try to get one with them.  The rooms are on the small size but with all the necessary stuff.  The staff was also nice. But the best is the location, it is near all mayor atractions.

title: Super bien placé
text:
hôtel choisi sur internet pour son emplacement, nous avons été satisfait.Le prix est très correct.La chambre était propre ainsi que la salle de bain et les sanitaires. La literie très bien aussi nous avons bien dormi.
Le personnel sympathique et à l'écoute
bref le top

title: It´s all about the location
text:
Okay.
If you are looking for the location - this is your hotel.
If you are looking for other facilities - maybe not.
The hotel is in premises where you have 6 rooms / floor with 38 floors, meaning that
200 persons might use two elevators at the sam time. Which is not possible.
So you end up waiting and waiting...
Then you are in the breakfast room, which is absolutely too small for such many
people. What happens - people are carrying their breakfast to the lobby ( small one),
to their rooms ( more hussle )...  you might lose your nerves...
The rooms are pretty ok, we had a room with nice view to the river.
Nothing classy but all you need in a compact way.
So it is all about the location.
We were very happy for our hotel. Kind of.

title: Bien placé pour le prix
text:
Hôtel bon rapport qualité prix et proximité de points à visiter.  De JFK prendre la E en express c'est 35 mn ! Times Square et shopping à macy s, Top of the rock, Empire state building, high line etc
Pas de chambre en bas car boîte le we le samedi soir et c'est très mal insonorisé. Je me suis plaint vigoureusement et l'hôtel nous a donné quelques bons chocolats. Par contre en bas on peut prendre les marches car ascenseurs longs aux heures de pointe...Une petite infiltration aussi le dernier jour et des odeurs de petit déjeuner dans la chambre assez écoeurant. Sinon personnel très avenant et à l'écoute. Merci pour la feuille de route imprimée pour le retour sur JFK. Chambre petite mais confortable. Nous aurions dû avoir un grand lit mais seuls nos enfants l'ont eu. Tant mieux pour eux. Nous n'avions pas pris le petit déjeuner car Paris baguette très bien à côté. Bref des trucs à régler pour s'améliorer mais un très bon bilan pour la semaine.

title: Beware the lifts
text:
Booked this hotel at the very last minute after a disastrous Airbnb attempt (don’t use Airbnb in NY).  
I thought a bit expensive however it is Manhattan so what do you expect. The location was great and walking distance to the Javitts Centre where we were working.
The check in staff were fantastic, really friendly and would do everything to help.
There are 36 floors to this hotel and only 6 rooms on each - they are served by two slow and small lifts - each taking a maximum of 8 (less with luggage). When the reception area is full it’s difficult to get to the lifts and you have to wait for them. The staff have a habit of blocking out a lift to save it for them with a ‘wet floor’ sign - even if they see customers waiting. My room on the 32nd floor regularly made 10 stops on the way down to the ground floor - once I counted 14 stops - after 8 people got in the stops were wasted as there was no room for anyone else.
This aside, the rooms were clean but very small - Manhattan again - towels were plentiful and the beds comfy.
All in all ok, but the lifts would put me off in the future.

title: Excelente custo beneficio!
text: Essa foi a segunda vez que fico hospedado em NYC, o hotel e muito bem localizado, ao lado do Metro, estação de ônibus e próximo à saída de ilha para New Jersey. O serviço em geral foi bom, o café da manhã que é uma raridade nesse perfil de hotel quebra um galho e atende muito bem pela qualidade oferecida e a praticidade de uma viagem intensa. Os quartos são pequenos, mas atente-se bem, com banheiro de um tamanho muito bom e cama excelente. A internet funcionou muito bem e foi um dos pontos altos, além de receberem compras on line sem problema algum. Ponto negativo são os números de elevadores versus o tamanha do prédio e a ausência de elevador de serviço. Se você está indo para NYC procurando um bom quarto esse é o local.

title: Brilliant location friendly staff
text: Can't ask for more. Great location, high floor city view rooms have wonderful skyline views. Can leave luggage free of charge also close to bus stop for Norwegian bus to Stewart Airport and also other airports. Breakfast room is small but we got a table OK. Some hot items but do not provide dairy free milk as standard. We brought our own and were given a mini fridge free of charge. All staff we spoke to were very friendly and pleasant and went out of their way to be helpful. Would definitely stay here when returning to New York in future.

title: Decent hotel
text:
The rooms were small and compact.
Buffet breakfast was decent spread
Near downtown area
5-7 min walk for down town
Gym facility is tied up with neighboring hotel
Hotel is in side street and hence no great view

title: Dec '16 Celebrated 25th wedding anniversary and had a wonderful time
text: What a nice hotel, clean, great staff at reception desk, housekeeping and restaurant. Our room was very nice, great view and the bed was very comfortable.  It was located in the center of Time Square and close to many tourist sites. I would definitely return some day. Our trip was in Dec of 2016.

title: NYC visit
text: This place is inexpensive and centered near Time Square. Good place to go on the cheap. Get up early for breakfast as the crowd grows by hour. The people are very nice and the room was clean. All in all you get what you pay for. It’s just a place to rest your feet because we spent soooo little time there.

title: Buena ubicación excelente relación precio- calidad
text: Si deseas hospedarte en un hotel confortable y que te permita conocer distintos destinos turísticos de interés en la ciudad de New York y que se encuentren a una distancia que puedas recorrer a pie en una zona segura les recomiendo altamente este hotel, su personal es amable y en el precio de la estadía ya te incluyen el desayuno , se recomienda reservar con anticipación

title: Why be close to Times Square?
text: Booked hotel to be close to the central attractions in New York. Not clever. Small rooms. Overcrowded. Breakfast can be best described as a stampede for junk food. Staff are clearly uninterested  in hotel guests. Best avoided. Much better available elsewhere.

title: Nice hotel
text: I booked this hotel because of it’s location, it’s central to the places we wanted to see.  Everyone at the front desk is very friendly, we were always greeted coming and going.  If you’re looking for a large room - keep looking.  Our room was just big enough for a king size bed, a small desk and a chair.  There is a walkway about 18” wide to get between the bed and the dresser that the TV is on.  On the flip side, how much room do you need to sleep?  Since we didn’t plan on staying in our room square dancing the whole time, none of this was an issue for us.  This location is walking distance from the theater district, Times Square, the subway, and many restaurants.  Yep, I’d book it again.

title: Liar receptionists
text:
When I arrived, I was told no rooms available for early check-in as hotel was full previous night. Had I informed hotel about my request of early check-in they would have got room prepared in advance. Contradictory, isn't? 
When I shown the girl my IHG app, that I had done a request for early check-in already, she was speechless but another girl came and started same story.
I checked last night 11pm and there were  available rooms to check-in as on 3/20. 
Well hotel has standard check-in time and they have right to honor early check-in or not, but why they lie? 
I'll make sure to avoid this hotel in future. Stay bridge suites is much better and they welcome guests early with a smile.

title: Unbeatable location, value, breakfast lady is the best!
text: The location of this hotel makes up for it's shortcomings - slow elevators and small rooms.  Rooms were clean.  Breakfast ladies were super friendly and accommodating.  All of the staff were friendly and accommodating.  There were plenty of restaurant choices just steps from the hotel.

title: Good enough, reasonable rates, small rooms.
text: This is a perfectly fine location in the heart of NYC. Understand the rooms are VERY small. The elevators are also small. So, leave a LOT of time to make your way downstairs for a free breakfast. With a discount, everything about this is fine. The beds are regular hotel sizes, but to accommodate these beds, everything else in the room is smaller--small closet, small desk, small tables, etc. All fine. Clean enough. VERY comfortable beds. Eat breakfast as early as possible. It gets crowded downstairs.

title: More like an open prison than hotel
text: What a grim place this is. To start with they should be done under trade descriptions act. It is nearer the Hudson River than Times Square. As an open prison inmates are prevented from drowning themselves as the bath plug doesn’t fit the hole. You are prevented from self harming by having to eat breakfast from plastic cutlery and polystyrene plates and then you are tortured at night by intermittent blowing heaters that it feels like wake you every 15 minutes. It’s only saving grace is the “prison officers” who are a cheerful bunch considering the dire environment.

title: Hôtel très bien placé
text:
bon Hôtel excepté 2 choses :
demander une  chambre le plus haut possible car il y a une boite de nuit ouverte tous les week ends juste en dessous de l'hötel.
2 ème point à revoir : la salle du petit déjeuner vraiment trop petite pour le nombre de personnes

title: Muy buena opción!
text:
Llegamos al hotel alrededor de las 8.30 am. Preguntamos para realizar el early check in y nos dijeron que a partir de 13 pm podríamos ingresar a la habitación. Nos guardaron las valijas y nos comentaron que podíamos servirnos lo que queríamos del desayuno. 
La habitación no es muy espaciosa, pero es mucho pretender para ny. 
Cuentan con café, jugo y té a disposición para servirte a lo largo de día.
El desayuno era bastante completo, pensábamos que por las opiniones leídas, iba a ser peor. Contaba con bagels, pancakes, omelets, opciones saladas, dulces, frutas, cereales etc. El espacio para desayunar es pequeño pero enseguida se iban desocupando mesas, o los mismos empleados del hote te iban ubicando. 
En las hrs pico de desayuno los ascensores tardaban bastante, ya que cuenta con solo dos.
La ubicación es buena, a dos cuadras del subte y tres de Port Authority 
Volveríamos !

title: Good Location
text: Less than five minutes walking from Port Authority Terminal. Check in was quick. Only 2 elevators serving 35 floors, so you can wait like forever to jump into an empty one. Room was clean but of average size. Iron and safe were available. Bed was comfortable. Breakfast was very basic. Check out was very fast.

title: Great staff!
text: After trying to get a hotel room elsewhere and dealing with rude people, we found ourselves at this Holiday Inn Express. It is clean and the staff was friendly and courteous. Especially Melissa at the front desk. She was Awesome! She even told us about her upcoming flight as we mentioned we missed ours. Thank You for your professionalism Melissa! We will come back.

title: Muy pequeño para desayunar
text:
El hotel está céntrico y la limpieza es buenisisiisisma vienen a limpiar todos los días y muy bien.
El desayuno está bien pero el espacio es muy pequeño...una pena...al igual que el ascensor....mucha gente para dos ascensores...aún así lo recomiendo

title: Took small
text: The rooms are too small for 4 people, only 2lifts which was a bit of a struggle sometimes.  The staff were friendly and helpful. Location is really good,easy to get anywhere. It was alright, we made do and we only slept there so not in the room for long.

title: Good Value Offer & Friendly Staff
text: Enjoyed a few days at this comfortable and clean Holiday Inn - situated a few minutes walk from the Main Port Authority Bus Terminal - the hotel is ideally suited to explore Manhattan. Very close to Time Square, the hotel offers a good standard of accommodation - bedroom and bathroom were of a good quality. Staff were helpful and friendly. A simple buffet breakfast was provided and whilst at times it gets very crowded, the staff do an excellent job in keeping things moving. Queues can be avoided by starting a bit earlier. The only other challenge are the two lifts, as at busy times you can wait a while for them to come if on the upper floors - not a major problem but at times a bit irritating. But would definitely return as the hotel offers a good value offer for central Manhattan

title: Great location!
text: Loved this hotel! The staff were very friendly and helpful. The location was great. It was easy to get to the places we needed to go by bus right around the corner. We were on the 36th floor away from the noise of the street level construction and we had a FABULOUS view of the Empire State Building from here. The beds were super comfy!  Even though the room was small, it was fine and expected because NY does NOT have a lot of room. You have to go up and cram people in to get everyone to fit. The breakfast was typical of the usual stuff in hotels: juice, coffee, pastries, eggs, sausage, breads, fruits, and yogurt. They had a make-your-own pancake maker (instead of a waffle maker). I do wish the eggs could be more customized and the yogurt could be NOT the light version because I am allergic to the artificial sweetener. All in all, I would stay at this hotel again if returning to the area.

title: Good by Manhattan Standards
text:
Hotel was very clean and staff very friendly and helpful with restaurants. Some give a discount to hotel guests. 
Room was small, but that's typical for Manhattan hotels. Nice comfy reading chair next to TV, but couldn't see the tv screen. But bathroom was very generously sized for NYC. 
Breakfast area was small and food was spread in 3 adjacent areas. But a good selection of tasty breakfast items and the staff did a great job of keeping clean. 
Excellent hotel if you only need a clean place to sleep, but it might be tight if you plan to spend many waking hours in hotel.

title: No cumple con los mínimos estándar de la Cadena
text:
Desilusión, siempre intento ir a cadenas de hoteles para asegurarme de que no va a estar tan mal el hospedaje, esta vez no se cumplió.

Las cosas buenas(que son pocas) 
-Muy buen Desayuno, al igual que el personal que atiende en ese sector, que se preocupa por acomodarte porque el lugar es muy chico.
-Internet anda muy bien
-Buena ubicación, cerca del Time Square y del Subterráneo.

Lo malo,
-Habitaciones muy chicas.
-Ascensores que no dan a basto para la cantidad de pisos, por lo que puedes demorarte unos 10 minutos, si es que tenes suerte y hay lugar para entrar al ascensor.
- Entra a la habitación olor a humo de cigarrillo y también de otras yerbas ( marihuana ) que se torna insoportable, normalmente entra por el respiradero del baño, y ni siquiera con el extractor prendido se logra impedir que ingrese el olor, es más hubieron días que el olor a marihuana se sentía en los pasillos del piso, y también lo sentimos en otros pisos cuando paraba el ascensor.
No sé si está permitido fumar cigarrillos en las habitaciones, pero de seguro que otras yerbas no. Me parece imperdonable que no se controle este tipo de actos dentro del establecimiento, más habiendo muchas familias con chicos.

title: Worst HI express stay for me, ever.
text: The train station is 5 minute’s walk away so we left for the elevator an HOUR before our train time.  It took 42 minutes before I was able to get a ride down the elevator.  My wife was 10 minutes behind me.   We missed our train.  One elevator was being used by staff to haul linens and cleaning supplies and the other was left for passengers since at least 920 when I first pushed the down button.   There’s no water bottles in the room, even as spire elite ambassadors and paying as much as $280/night.   David Canty - Do you read these reviews?  I know you can fix this place.

title: Great rooms, location and breakfast
text:
We wanted a central hotel and got it with this one! Great service, rooms really clean and big and an amazing breakfast everyday. A great choice and to repeat for sure!
Price is really good when comparing with other hotels and being part of Holiday Inn chain, makes us feel more secure. Close by walk to the main landmarks

title: Friendly Team
text:
The staff makes this hotel.

Pros- 
-clean rooms
- friendly staff (especially breakfast host, can’t remember her name but worked sat/sun morning)I would come back to this hotel just to run into her again.
-close to Times Square and subways
-comfy beds

Cons- 
-slowwwwww elevator 
- small rooms
- could use some new furniture 
- towels are scratchy

title: Custo beneficio
text: Hotel barato comparado aos precos dos hoteis em NYC. Localizacao excelente! Quartos feitos pra dormir confortaveis e somente isso. Cafe da manha bem limitado. Em geral en US eh assim sem muita graca o cafe da manha. Mas vale a pena pra voce que so quer descansar depois do dia que passou fora.

title: New York City For 10 days
text:
We stayed at this hotel for our Christmas vacation. The location is good and very central. We walked to many places even if it was freezing cold because of the proximity. 

The rooms are small but big enough for my wife and I and our 2 kids. We stayed on the second to the highest floor. We had a very good view of the Empire State Building. It was decorated with Christmas lights and during New Years it had a cool light show. 

I would recommend this hotel to people visiting New York City. Late at night the outside can get a bit sketchy but that is kind of expected being so central in a big city. 

I love New York and my family and I had a blast. 

Awesome Location 

Elevators are a bit cramped

title: Buena relación ubicación, precio y calidad
text:
Buena ubicacion, persona muy amable, habitaciones pequeñas pero funcionales, la cama muy comoda y grande.

El desayuno bien, poca variedad pero rico.
.
Tienen un tema con los elevadores, si los tomas en horario de mayor transito puede ser complicado subir y bajar.

El personal atento y siempre amable.

title: Excellent time in New York
text:
This was our 3rd time in New York but the 1st at this hotel. The hotel is brilliant the rooms are the largest we have stayed in, lovely and clean fresh towels hot water and free breakfast what more can you ask for ... the bed was the most comfortable bed we have slept in the pillows were lovely and soft just what is needed after all the walking around New York.
The breakfast was all you could ask for fresh pancakes, bagel, omelet , toast and cereals hot fresh coffee and plenty of milk and yogurts, the staff in the breakfast room were fabulous very welcoming and happy all the time, happy to chat with everyone makes a lovely change smiling people in the morning made my stay much better.
The check in and out was quick smooth and effortless the front of house staff pleasant and chatty.
Before coming read a lot about the lift situation we never had a problem with the lift longest we wait was approx 3/4 mins , one morning we walked down the steps (21st floor) not bad at all but saying that going down is better than going up.
If we ever return we would stay here again the location, bedroom size and breakfast staff make this a brilliant hotel 😁

title: Buena relación precio calidad
text: Estuvimos en el hotel 5 noches, la habitación cómoda, limpia. Incluye desayuno, el personal muy amable. Si bien en el desayuno suele haber mucha gente, se puede desayunar sin problema. La ubicación es buena. Volvería a alojarme en el hotel.

title: Voyage entre  copines
text:
Nous rentrons d'un séjour de 5 jours à New york et avions opté pour cet hôtel. A l'arrivée un jeune homme blond nous a accueilli. Peu sympathique j'ai trouvé, aucun sourire  Je demande si c'est possible de payer plus tard car je n'avais pas encore changé les euros en dollars il n'a pas voulu alors que ça collègue à côté lui avait dit oui... enfin bref.
Ensuite arrive à la chambre au 18eme étage, belle chambre et belle vue comme j'avais demandé. Il y a une machine à café et thé dans la chambre, coffre gratuit important pour mettre les documents importants. Chambre propre et lit très confortable. Seul hic et comme vu dans les autres commentaires chambre mal isolée. 
Le petit dej de l'hôtel est très correct par contre la salle est petite donc nous sommes rapidement les uns sur les autres. Le personnel très agréable surtout Tereza et Nichele juste adorable ! 
Pour résumer hôtel bon et a proximité de tout point touristique : métro, times square.

title: 5 Day Break
text:
Really enjoyed our stay here. The location is great for everything we wanted to do. We walked to the Empire State Building, Rockefeller, Times Square, 5th Avenue and Central Park plus many others. 

It's easy to reach the subway on 42nd and get further afield. We flew into JFK and got the LIRR to Penn Station and walked to the hotel from there. 

The breakfast staff were lovely and helpful and always had a little chat. Breakfast was fine - it's not extensive but it sets you up for the walking you're going to do! Tea coffee, juices, muffins, pancakes, omelette, bagels, pancakes, eggs, sausage and fruit. 
Rooms were clean, coffee making in room, safe, toiletries, comfy beds and ample room for 2.

The front desk are friendly and helpful. There are ice machines and vending machines and a 7/11 at the end of the street. There are two computers in reception to print boarding passes etc.

All in all a brilliant stay for the price, definitely recommend.

title: Hotel plutot bien situé
text:
Hôtel plutôt bien situé, à deux pas de Times Square ce qui a facilité la découverte de New-York. 

Chambre confortable et propre, mais en revanche pas très bien insonorisée. Lorsqu'il y a du monde, on entend les portes qui claquent et les différents allées et venues.

Le petit-déjeuner est correct, mais le matin, il y a foule, plus de places pour s'installer.
Cela entraîne aussi des problèmes au niveau des ascenseurs qui sont plus que bondés et donc une attente qui semble interminable.

Néanmoins, cela n'a en rien altéré le séjour qui fut merveilleux.

title: Good stay
text: Stayed at this hotel due to its convenient location and value for money. With less than a 5 minute walk to Times Square it was perfect for us, with plenty of restaurants and shops nearby. The room wasn’t overly spacious but had what we needed and we were unable to hear any noise from outside. The only downfall was that there was no where to store our 3 large suitcases. Breakfast was always great, the staff were attentive and friendly and it was always well stocked. Would recommend and would stay here again.

title: Week in New York
text: We stayed with Holiday Inn for 4 nights and they were good.  The room was a bit dated.. The furniture needs replacing.  Overall clean.  Close to all amenities and just around the corner from Penn Station.. Free breakfast was amazing and stay was very friendly.

title: Great location
text: We stayed here for one night with three other couples.  The location was amazing for our visit to Madison Square Garden.  The room was super clean and the king size bed extremely comfortable.  Employees were friendly and the continental breakfast was quite varied and plentiful.  My only complaint was noise in the middle of the night from the room next door, however my husband never heard a thing.  We would definitely stay here again.

title: Good location
text: Good located hotel for times square, restaurants and pick up points for tours, the staff are great especially the breakfast ones they can't do enough for you, the rooms are slightly small but for a short break are fine , free tea and coffee all day is a bonus when you arrive back after a cold long day, lifts can be slow so would recommend a liw floor although you would get better views higher up. Would recommend this hotel

title: location location location
text: Last week I traveled with a group of 25 high school students, teachers and parent chaperones to New York City, from Sault Ste Marie, ON Canada. Our hotel was centrally located, immaculately clean, considerate to all age groups of travelers, exceeded expectations, and was a secure “home base” for the whole group. The front desk staff were professionally accommodating, friendly, helpful and always aware of what was going on both in and out of the building. The breakfast room staff were extra ordinarily friendly, and helpful, inquisitive and treated the teens with the same courtesy as the adults. Breakfast at the hotel was a great way to start the day, and the food variety met all nutritional needs and preferences. The rooms, although compact, were clean comfortable and with all modern amenities. When I return to NYC this is certainly a property I would stay at again, and highly recommend to any traveler. Great experience.

title: Hotel com quarto pequeno.
text:
Hotel fica, pertinho da Times Square . Perto também de várias estações de metrô e da estação de trem Penn Station (pra quem tem interesse de fazer um bate e volta pra Washington, fica muito fácil de ir pra essa estação de trem.
O quarto do hotel é muito pequeno para duas pessoas, possui uma cama  confortável.
Banheiro limpo e moderno. O único porém do quarto é que não possui frigobar, apenas uma cafeteira. O café da manhã é bom, tem iogurtes, bolos, pães, ovos mexidos, ovos cozidos, panquecas, frutas, bacon e sucos. A equipe do hotel é muito rude e pouca simpática, com exceção  da funcionária Sandra, que dispensa comentários, sempre educada, prestativa, pronta para ajudar e com um sorriso no rosto, não é a toa que tem uma foto dela, no quadro do funcionário do mês. Não poderia de esquecer do carregador de malas Walter, muito prestativo e simpático, pronto para ajudar.
Não recomendo esse hotel, pela localização da rua que ele fica, pois à noite é escura e lugar de prostituição, apesar de ser 4 quadras da Time Square.
O hotel cobra caro pelo tamanho do quarto e internet fraca, cai toda hora, sem falar do ar condicionado ruim, não estabiliza, fica desligando, ficar aqui só pelo café, e pagar caro, não vale a pena !!!
 Da próxima vez que eu for a Nova York, não ficarei novamente nele, com certeza.

title: Awesome location
text: This hotel has been updated and is like new. Nice staff very helpful and free breakfast was a bonus. Location was amazing subway close a lot of bars and restaurants in walking distance will definitely stay here again 👍

title: Súper bien
text:
Superó mis expectativas. Todo bien: ubicación, internet ok, atención muy buena, desayuno muy bueno y además te podes llevar algo para el día (café, facturas, frutas)
La única contra diría que la habitación es chica pero que importa. Precio muy razonable.

title: Πολύ καλή επιλογή!
text: Ιδανική επιλογή καθώς είναι σε πολύ κεντρικό σημείο με δυνατότητα να περπατήσετε σε εμπορικά καταστήματα, στην Times Square. Πλούσιο πρωινό με ωραίες γεύσεις αλλά μικρός χώρος. Όμως πάντα έβρισκες τραπέζι. Γενικά τα δωμάτια των ξενοδοχείων στην Νέα Υόρκη είναι μικρά αλλά το συγκεκριμένο είχε άνετο χώρο για 2 άτομα. Το μπάνιο πάντα καθαρά και περιποιημένο. Είναι σε απόσταση αναπνοής από το Empire State Building όπου αυτό σου δίνει την δυνατότητα να το βλέπεις και από το παράθυρό σου (στη δική μας περίπτωση έγινε). Το προσωπικό αρκετά εξυπηρετικό και πρόσχαρο στο να μας βοηθήσουν να βρούμε εισιτήρια για αγώνα, ταξί, οδηγίες γενικές κτλ. Το προτείνω.

title: Birthday/Retirement Trip
text: We received a very warm and speedy check-in on arrival and recognised as a spire elite member. On entering our room I was pleasantly surprised and not what I was expecting as a holiday Inn Express brand, the rooms were more furnished to the Holiday Inn brand. The room was clean and well-furnished and the bathroom had both a bath and shower with proper toiletries by Bath & Body works and not the usual dispenser attached to the wall as normal Expresses. Good choice of items for breakfast (apart from the sausage gravy which was on offer one day). We liked the pancake making machine. Breakfast area is on the small size and can become very busy at times but the staff kept it moving and a very short wait for a table or offer a tray to take back to your room. One good idea I liked was that they put in the lifts a coloured coded guide for breakfast times stating the most and least busy times which can help plan your day. One note of caution, due to the close proximity of the hotels which back onto this hotel, one day my wife was opening the curtains and got more of a sight then she was expecting from the gentlemen opposite. The hotel is ideally placed within New York to reach all the attraction either on foot or the subway which is a two minute walk away. The nearest subway station 42 Street is on the direct ‘E’ line with JFK Airport. This is a good choice of hotel for a short break visit. Free internet is included with in the price of the room and two terminals in the reception area along with a tour desk.

title: convenient location
text:
Small and modern rooms. Its ideal for a quick step out to the city. I love the location as everything is just walking distance. 
Food - ahh well food is disappointing. Breakfast felt like I am having a meal in a flight.

title: Basic, elevators a major issue, breakfast queue at peak hours
text: Stayed for nearly a week - stay was comfortable and staff was friendly. The breakfast space is tiny and the two small elevators is too little to cater to the place. If you are caught up at a bad time, it might take 20 minutes to get a ride up the elevators.

title: Gran ubicación para un hotel "cumplidor"
text: Como todo hotel de esta gran cadena, cumple con las exprectativas. Muy buena ubicación, a tan solo una cuadra y media de Porth Authority con su estacion de Metro y a unas 5 cuadras de pleno Times Square. El check in fue rápido y efectivo. La habitación cuenta con caja de seguridad y wifi. El espacio para 4 personas es bastante justo....por no decir apretado! Yo creo q es ideal para una pareja. Ofrrce un desayuno que esta muy bien para arrancar el día. En definitiva, ideal para andar todo el día por la Gran Manzana y volver para bañarse, conectarse al mobil un rato y tener un buen descanso!!! Volveria si es para estar un par de noches!!

title: Breakfast is the best part!
text: This is a very spare hotel that is in the Garment District,(ove seeing the fashions) not in Times Square. But I love it!  Main reason, they have a full breakfast and that is rare in the Big Apple. If you are looking for a luxurious hotel, do not come here. I am lucky to be fit, because the elevator takes FOREVER. I took the stairs numerous times to get down to the 1st floor. It's clean simple and convenient.

title: Excelente Custo Benefício
text: Ótima localização a uma quadra do metrô e do Port Authority e poucas quadras da Times Square. Bom café da manhã com frutas, ovos, bacon, iogurte, sucos e outros mais. Atendimento cordial e eficiente. Quartos com ferro e tábua e secador. Espaço do quarto compatível com os demais de Manhattan. Limpeza impecável.

title: 위치는 좋아요!
text:
포트 어소리티에서 가까워서 위치는 정말 좋습니다. 그래서 그런지 밤에 돌아다닐때 좋았습니다. 시티뷰 방을 예약했었는데 창문이 드러워서 시티뷰를 제대로 즐길수가 없었습니다. 히터가 창문 아래 있어서 김이 서려서 그런건가 싶었는데 일부러 히터를 하나도 안틀고 봤는데... 창문이 더러운 거 였습니다.
그냥 아무방이나 할 껄.. 시티뷰를 했는데 시티뷰를 제대로 즐길수 없었던게 너무 아쉬웠습니다. 나머지는 보통의 방이었습니다.

title: Tres bien placé
text:
A 15 mn environ de l Empire State Building et quelques minutes du coeur de Times Square, hotel tres bien placé avec restos et plein de boutiques de tous genres, souvenirs, shopping, un enorme H&M, Macy's, Hard Rock cafe, M&Ms store,Madame Tussaud qui d ailleurs n'est pas interessant comparé à celui de Londres par exemple, car beaucoup plus petit et franchement sans interet.
Le personnel de l'hotel est tres accueillant et disponible, petit dejeuner correct et basique, l'essentiel y est mais seul petit hick, la vaisselle est jetable et en plastique donc, mais on mange bien quand même.
Accés internet possible a la reception, plusieurs ordinateurs a dispo des clients.
Notre chambre pour 4 personnes etait correcte, avec coffre fort digital dans le placard , important pour ranger ses objets de valeur et documents de voyage.

title: Snow Adventure
text:
My family and I booked this hotel for the proximity to Time Square and the price.  It isn’t the most beautiful or spacious hotel but it served our purpose. 

Upon check in were were greeted by the clerk by the name of Sandra.  Very nice and helpful as were the other staff members we encountered.  One night my son had a sore throat and I needed salt, I asked the young man, and I am sad to say I cannot remember his name how I could find some and he told me he was by himself at the moment but he would have some sent to my room.  I thought to myself he will forget but about 10 minutes later someone had brought me the salt. Thank you so much.

The breakfast was not bad at all.  It had a fair amount of food such as scrambled eggs, sausage links and turkey patties, cinnamon rolls, cereal, pancakes, toast, bagels, etc.  They also had coffee, juices and milk.  There is a coffee maker in the room but no microwave.

As for the elevators, yes there are only 2 but we really didn’t have to wait that long for them.

Overall, I would recommend this hotel based on location and price.

title: Absolutely Excellent
text: Great place to stay.  Had all the amenities I was looking for in a quick trip to the city and an overnight stay with my Mom.  We were within walking distance to MSG.  They had fresh cookies and coffee/tea for all guests upon check-in.  Extremely friendly staff!  I had advised the gentleman at the desk that we would have to leave early the next morning and he had 2 breakfast bags ready for us when we left.  the rooms were very small, but didn't need much more than what it was to lay our head at night.  Extremely clean.  We loved the area out front where we sat and enjoyed a glass of wine that we brought with us.  It was a little chilly.  Space heaters would have been perfect, but not sure if allowed on the NYC sidewalks.  Would definitely stay here again!

title: Disappointment
text: The lobby is a sardine can. The staff behind the counter is indifferent to the guests. There are only two elevators for 36 floors. Average wait time for an elevator is 20 minutes. The heating unit in my room banged and made noises all night. The unit in my friend's room didn't work at all. I got two hours sleep. Avoid this place at all costs.

title: Great location and rates but elevators...
text: The hotel is in Hell's Kitchen not far from Times Sq. The hotel has 30 plus floors with about 6 rooms on each floor with a bank of two elevators, used for guests and room attendants.(Because it is a tall narrow hotel, there is no room for a back of the house elevator for use by hotel staff  as is the case in other hotels). I was on the 21st floor and only had to deal with a 10 minute elevator wait once during my 3 day visit, however, the people on the elevator coming form the higher floors, told me they had waited over 25 minutes! I hope the hotel can figure out how to time the use of elevators during busy times of the morning.  Also due to the footprint  of each floor with  the two elevators, when guests closed their doors, it was very loud. Our room, 2102?,  was small, however, the bed was one of the most comfortable beds I have ever slept on and the room also had a coffeemaker. The shower  had good water pressure as well..  We also never took advantage of their complimentary breakfast.

title: Brilliant location
text: Room - tiny but lovely.  My daughter and I traveled for a Tap Dance work-shop.  She was enthralled with the view; directly over-looking the Empire State Building.  Walk to Times Square and Broadway.  Breakfast was wonderful; many great restaurants in the area but we also enjoyed the on-site restaurant.  Good menu and value.  Front desk staff were wonderful and accommodating - arranged late check-out and ride service to the airport.  Would definitely choose this hotel again.

title: Excelente
text: Ótimo hotel, funcionários super simpáticos, que atendem muito bem. Além disso, fica perto de boas lanchonetes, e do lado da Times Square e do Madison Square Garden. Você pode ir andando, já que é tudo pertinho, ou pode pegar o metrô, já que tem várias estações que vão para todos os lugares! Pra melhorar, ainda tem cafeteira no quarto. Recomendo!

title: Ótima Opção de Hotel
text:
Hotel com Café da Manhã com boas opções (panquecas, ovos, bacon, cereais, iogurtes, sucos, pães e bolos). Boa Localizacao, no quarteirão da Port Authority e há cerca de 5 minutos da Times Square. Fácil acesso pela 8th Av. Servicos proximos. Excelente atendimento no café da manhã e recepção. Quartos na medida...não muito espaçosos, mas atendendo as necessidades. 
Para Cafe da manhã pode ser necessário optar por horario de menor pico, mas as atendentes são cordiais e sempre ajudam a todos. Voltaria com certeza!!!! Muito satisfeito com hotel...

title: Amazing!
text: hotel comodo a due passi da Times Square. Personale molto gentile ed efficiente. Le camere sono piccoline, ma ben sistemate, la nostra era nuovissima, credo ristrutturata da poco. Consiglio le camere ai piani alti per sentire meno il rumore della città. Colazione classica come in tutti gli holiday Inn, comprensiva sia prodotti salati che dolci. Unica pecca gli ascensori un po lenti, perchè essendo usati anche dal personale delle pulizie, si formano un pò di file nei momenti di maggiore picco.

title: Tiny rooms but perfect location for a good price
text:
Really happy with this hotel. Tiny rooms but location was brilliant and with the city view you can see the Empire State and freedom tower from your room :-)

Ok buffet breakfast. We didn't have any issues with the lift just a small delay on our last day when we were heading for check out as a lot of others were doing the same.

Go for a high floor

title: Weekend Stay
text:
Great location with a nice service approach..
Elevators seemed to have lines of guests most peak hours of traffic
Breakfast area seemed to struggle with replenish food with 100's of guests waiting to be fed!

title: Great experience
text: Great hotel to stay near time square with easily accessible resturants and convenient parking place.. Room was clean with really amazing city view from 3306 room.. I would highly recommend this hotel...

title: Great Location, Small Rooms
text: This location could not have been more perfect! It’s a 10 minute walk to Times Square, right in the middle of tons of restaurants and bars, and by a Subway/Metro entrance. The complimentary breakfast is actually pretty good, and the staff is nice as well. My only complaint is how small the rooms are. Overall, I would stay here again.

title: Great Staff service, quite ok variety of breakfast and great location
text:
1) Check in/check- out- was quite fast. Staff allowed us to leave our luggages with claim tickets.

2)WIFI- was great. Fast connection

3) Room- we got the king size bed which was great.bed was just right, not too hard or too soft. We had a good night sleep. Hotel was quiet at night. The construction right in front of the hotel didn't bother our sleep. Quite spacious room. It has closet with seats we can sit or hang our stuff. 

3) Bathroom- has enough space for me but for my tall hubby (6"3 ft), he says a bit small for him. Bathroom is Clean and smells clean. We got free toiletries and clean towels everyday. You can request other stuff like toothbrush and such. The only thing I was hoping they will have is bidet.

4) Breakfast- variety is quite ok. My hubby is happy having bacon on our first day but they replaced it was replaced with sausages on the 2nd day. I'm not a bacon person so I like that they got fruits, milk, juices, coffee, bread, pancakes, diff varieties of yoghurt, scrambled egg or omelette, and turkey burger. So it was quite ok for me. It made me full and happy as I start the day. I was only hoping that their pantry will be larger to accommodate more people like the ones we had at Paris Canal Villete or Amsterdam Central. But I didn't have any issues since we have our breakfast by 7-8am. 

5) Customer service- staff are great and accommodating. I guess that's basic for every holiday inn express, it's their brand service. Their smile made me home and comfortable with every inquiry or request I made. Kudos!

6) Location- location was great. We just walked going to Rockeffeler, Grand Central Terminal, Central Park and Times Square. There are a lot of restaurants and convenience store at the area. Also just 2 blocks away from the subway and bus station.

Hotel is very basic and quite old building. It's quite cramp at the lobby and the hall way.

Other than that, everything is perfect.

I highly recommend Holiday Inn Express Times Square for your stay in NY

title: Everything pretty good BUT terrible elevator
text:
I found pretty much everything at this hotel (staff/room/breakfast) good and functional but definitely a very difficult elevator. 
I was in a pretty high floor and it took me quite a lot of time to be able to take it or leave it. I even spent almost 20 minutes waiting for it and got in a lot of trouble for making it late to some appointments.
The elevator was disappointing: it went out of order in many occasions and it would be difficult for them to fix it. I would recommend them to have another elevator for their cleaning staff only so it doesn’t get so crazy for the hotel guests.
I would only recommend this hotel if you’re looking for a comfortable room, good breakfast, well treat, if you get lucky to be assigned a room that’s not on a very high floor and most of all if you are EXTREMELY PATIENT.
If not then you’ll be in trouble...

title: Great location,convenient, friendly staff!
text: While the rooms are pretty small, the location makes up for it. It's away from the craziness of times square but close enough to everything. The breakfast staff is the morning are super friendly and helpful. Get to breakfast early, or else you will be waiting for the elevator for awhile (or you can walk up the stairs). Super convenient if you're attending an event at the Javits Center! Short walk to trains, stores, port authority, times square etc

title: Great Location - Small Rooms - Dodgey Elevator
text: Unless you are looking for a hotel you want to spend a lot of time hanging in the lobby or hotel bar, this is a good clean place to stay. This hotel is in a great location, but if you plan to spend any time in the hotel or in your room, pick another location. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Clean and small. The hotel has 30+ floors and we were on 7. I was wishing we were on a higher floor until the elevator had issues and we walked down 7 floors.  We saw the elevator mentioned in older reviews, and were surprised the issues were ongoing still. This hotel was in the areas we wanted to see and close to the subway allowing us to go to other places easily. Price was moderate.  We were in room 702, bed was squeaky and seemed like an old innerspring type mattress with a topper. It was comfortable, but the hotel info said recently upgraded?? We only had coffee as the breakfast was like most hotel buffets.

title: COMODO MA SOLO PER DORMIRE
text: L'Hotel si trova a pochi passi da Times Square ed è veramente comodo per qualsiasi spostamento a Manhattan. Purtroppo la struttura è datata, le camere sono comunque pulite e i letti confortevoli. E' una delle poche strutture che offre anche la prima colazione, peccato che la sala ad essa adibita sia veramente piccola e se si sbaglia orario bisogna attendere per trovare un tavolo. Ci sono solo 2 ascensori e negli orari di punta diventa veramente un problema utilizzarli.

title: Struttura da rinnovare
text:
Sono un gold member IHG e sono spesso ospite negli alberghi del gruppo. Prima di arrivare a New York ho soggiornato in varie città del NC e sono sempre stato ospite degli Holiday Inn Express. Devo dire molto buoni, in belle strutture con servizi efficienti e massima pulizia. Qui a NY invece , al di là della posizione molto centrale dell’albergo non vi sono molti punti a vostro favore. La camera 909 in cui sono ancora ospite , poiché partirò  domani, e molto piccola , le pulizie non soddisfacenti, il climatizzatore da cui entrava aria fredda, la macchina del caffè guasta e le lenzuola non cambiate già dal primo giorno ( cosa molto grave) ed il letto appena tirato su ( senza puntualizzare tante altre cose che non vanno in una struttura vecchia come questa ) . Il tutto ad un costo straordinario di 770$ per due notti. Il medesimo prezzo lo si pagava in altri alberghi di categoria superiore qui in città .
Se la cosa continuerà così io non verrò più nel vostro albergo qui a NY ne lo potrò consigliare a nessuno

title: Pre Christmas New York
text:
Had a great time in New York and a lot of this was due to the hotel. 
The staff were friendly and helpful, the complimentary breakfast excellent and, best of all, the proximity of many of places to visit. Connections to transportation good. Room comfortable but the only thing I would criticise was the noise of the lift close by.
As a great hotel and location I would recommend it.

title: 便利な立地と朝食付き
text:
ヘラルドスクェアにある便利なホテル
メイシーズにも3分程度、女性1人でも夜歩くのに怖さは感じません。
最低限の朝食ですが無料。物価の高いニューヨークでは、便利。コーヒー、パン、パンケーキ、ヨーグルト、卵などがあります。朝食後も、お水やコーヒーは飲めるので、便利。
2度目の利用です。
ただ、繁華街に面しているので、低層階は夜中までうるさいので、要注意。安眠したい方は高層階へ。

title: M
text: Wow fantastic hotel, with the most helpful and friendly staff. Great location just a 20 minute walk to all the big shops on Time Square. Great restaurants, would highly recommend O'lunneys fantastic food and unbelievable polite,helpful and charming staff

title: DONT KNOW WHY THEY CHEAT PEOPLE ON THEIR CARDS
text:
As usual u dont get any services for your room in holiday inn express.
We were asked to give our card details for security purpose. We asked them for cash as we were travelling from india bt they wanted card itself.
And now when we are back from USA they have charged my card unnecessarily and giving any right reply for the same.
This i would call complete cheating on their part in every regard.
Kindly avoid this property

title: great hotel... some nearby streets ... ??
text: We have stayed at this hotel three years in a row, and were delighted to be welcomed back by some of the same employees, front desk and breakfast room.  Hotel is great, breakfast is excellent.  Room is great, safe and refrigerator are appreciated. ,Tea, hot chocolate always available free.  Warm cookies in the afternoon. Business Center great.  Hotel is close to Port Authority, theatres, Macy's, Rockefeller Center...great easy access to all tourist treats.  We were never afraid walking the nearby streets, though the homeless have increased, they threaten no one.

title: Wouldn't stay again
text:
I stayed for 2 nights at this hotel and about 3 hours in on day one I wanted to leave. First of all the lobby is impossible to navigate because it's so small. With the influx of people, staff and the ridiculously small hallway near the elevators, it's a nightmare to wheel a cart of luggage and things in and out of. 

The room itself was tiny even for NYC standards. It was also dingy and dirty. When I went to wash my face before heading out for the day the towel I used literally had an imprint of what looked like makeup (as if someone threw the towel on their face with makeup on in an effort to wipe it off). Usually I decline room service on quick stays but on this one I wanted new towels, when I returned to my room late in the evening on day 2 I was hoping my room might have been serviced but I'm pretty confident all that was done was fold the same sheets neatly back onto my bed and guess what? I had no new towels! The old ones were collected and the remaining unused one was all I had left. Also, I couldn't get the TV to turn on or respond to anything until the morning of my departure.

This hotel is tiny, dingy, and disappointing. The only pro is it's location to the Javits center an Port Authority. There are many other hotels on the street that I can't imagine are any worse than this one was.

title: Excellent Value for the rate!
text: Location, location!  Walking distance to Times Square, Central Park, Macy’s, Empire State Building etc.  3 blocks from multiple subway lines.  The rooms have been updated in a modern style and are very clean.  Comfy beds.  Yes, it is a little loud if you are facing 8th Ave and the wait for lifts were a bit of pain, but I honestly can’t complain for what we paid for the room.  This is a great find!!

title: NEW YORK
text:
Excelente hotel, esta muy bien ubicado y la habitacion es chica pero con todo lo necesario.. Proveen de cafetera y dan desayuno.
Las recepcionistas todas muy atentas sobre todo Massiel Castillo, quien fue muy cordial con nosotros.

title: Se tivesse frigobar!!!
text: Localização espetacular!!! O frigobar seria uma comodidade muito bem vinda, depois de vc andar por 5 horas!!!! Apesar de possuir máquina de gelo e vending machines em alguns andares, vc certamente irá passar em um seven eleven ou em uma CVS e abastecer!

title: Great if location is everything, otherwise well overpriced for basic 3* hotel
text:
Booked my stay there 6-9 Nov 2017 through BA Holidays for a brief visit to NYC from London for business/leisure and needed a centrally located place. Chose Holiday Inn Express (HIE) for the usual standards provided by the brand as seen in Europe yet the standards are no way match to the usual high European or Middle Eastern standards or the Far East. It seems the way the airlines of America have somewhat different standards than the rest of Europe and Middle East, hotels also have different standards. I've got to say the staff are somewhat great but it is the system and hotel as a whole that could have been better. The hotel is usually well overpriced yet unlike its European or Middle Eastern HIEs, it doesn't even have a refrigerator to store water/drinks or basic necessities e.g. medicines. Ageing furnitures and or airconditioning unit needs to updated/with full of dirt (raises hygiene issue - something that probably wouldn't be tolerated in Europe. Electric switch and sockets seems like ready to come off, making one fear for the hotel security deposit amount blocked on the card. 
Nearby construction is an issue and may affect the sleep for those who are sensitive to noises or who wants to lie in beyond 7:30am (which in my case I wanted to do following previous day long flight).
Breakfast is OK but again could do much better with fresher and better quality produce rather than producing mass produced ready made warmed up food. Vegetarian option lacking/cross contamination is an issue, which are again better enforced in Europe. 
Lifts/elevators are a big problem as it seems to take ages to arrive (allow extra 10-15 mins on hand) if one has meeting to attend or going for breakfast before the cut off time).

It seems the hotel owners are indifferent to service improvements due to knowing of the fact that high demand would always remain regardless, thanks to location. I would try to avoid it next time by venturing out further. I would only stay there again if location and time is of the essence.

title: Girls getaway
text: Hotel is in a great location... very clean room.... the bathroom door had a pocket door which is a great space saver but was very heavy to move and was unable to fully close so it did not provide adequate privacy.... The room did not  have a microwave or a small refrigerator... which would have been great  to heat up and save our leftovers, etc... Breakfast was good but there are not enough seats in the dining area .... I would definitely stay here again!!!!!! I absolutely recommend this hotel despite a few minor annoyances....

title: Gran hallazgo
text: Un hotel  con muy buena ubicacion, a un precio que no era desmesurado, con desayuno, cerca de todo y muy limpio.Que mas pedir.Tenia cerca un supermercado y desde las habitaciones de atras se veia el Empire State.

title: EXCELLENT
text: This was my first time visiting NYC. My experience here was awesome! I would absolutely recommend this hotel to others.  The staff was very helpful and friendly.  We were able to check in early, with no problem.  Juan was the best, he was so attentive and helpful with recommendations and directions.  I can't wait to get back.

title: MUY BUENO
text:
Muy buena ubicación, la habitación muy confortable. El personal amable, excepto una sola chica de la recepción que no recuerdo el nombre lamentablemente, era bastante desagradable. El desayuno muy bueno también y el personal de este sector para destacar Ivet, Oscar y Theresa. 
El precio es adecuado para lo que ofrecen, quizás deberían tener un ascensor más, es muy grande el hotel y en los horarios pico se complicaba. Saludos

title: Noisy room in a charmless hotel
text:
We had a room at the 4th level facing AC equipment from another building and the noise was just annoying. I went to front desk  to explain the situation and they told me that there was nothing to do. My first time using ear plugs in a hotel.  The breakfast service was ok, but the plastic and paper services were completely charmless. I went back to my student years for a while.
Considering that I had two nights off for being a loyal customer to the IHG hotel chain, I found they had a funny way to acknowledge that and to encourage me to discover different hotel brands.

title: EXCELLENT
text: Very pleasant stay of 1 week with my companion we visited the statue of liberty, the central park and wallstreet. We also ate a pizza at Famous Amadeus a famous food truck on 8th Ave and Famous Amadeus ate a slice of lamb. If we go back one day we will go shopping in Greenwich

title: Great Stay!
text: I visited New York for business with my wife.  The hotel was in a very convenient location to Times Square and the Javit Conference Center.  The room was a little small but likely similar to other downtown hotels.  There are many restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.  Room was clean and the staff was friendly and helpful.    Breakfast was good but the breakfast room can get crowded.

title: Fanatastic location
text: Excellent location 10mins from Times Square, rooms are good, very clean,  beds exceptionally comfortable and clean, well equipped room.  Free WiFi, the express breakfast is adequate, staff very attentive and nothing is too much trouble, allow yourself 2hrs to get off the island to get back the airport (JFK) I would recommend anyone to stay here ..

title: Great hotel...few improvements
text:
Stayed here with my husband for 5 days in October 2017. The hotel is located on 8th Avenue which is about a 10 minute walk from Times Square. The staff here are really helpful and friendly. The hotel is very busy and compact. The rooms are very nice indeed and are spotless if a little on the small side. 

Downsides:
Hotel only has two lifts which sounds fine but the hotel is 36 floors high so it can take a while to get a lift during peak periods.

The hotel doesn’t have its own bar area but a loud busy sports bar attached to it that you can use...very busy in the evening.

There are security guards outside the hotel but don’t let that put you off because some of NYCs more needy people tend to congregate outside the front of the hotel in the evening.

title: Gute Lage, aber das wars
text:
Das Hotel liegt sehr zentral zum Times Square und zu anderen interessanten Plätzen der Stadt, auch die Subway ist nicht weit. Das Frühstück ist typisch für USA, viel Plastik, wenig dahinter.
Am unverschämtesten war der Bellman, er behauptete, dass man um 03.00 Uhr morgens kein Taxi für 4 Personen bekäme, er könne auch keines rufen. Also buchten wir einen airportservice für 139,--$.
Wie wir später erfahren haben, gibt es diesen Service bereits für 89,--$.
Wer wohl die 50,--$ eingesteckt hat??

Das Zimmer war ok, leider haben wir lange im voraus gebucht, so dass die Zimmer unverschämt teuer waren.
Prei-/Leistung stimmt hier nicht.

title: LCOR Travel
text: So friendly. Busy.  Great price and location.   Breakfast was fun.  Much better than I expected. Starbucks close by!  They really want to help and get you to come back.  Easy trip to and from JFK. I was on level 25. It was quiet.

title: Great location in the heart of the city
text:
Was very surprised! Hotel was spot on, from super nice staff, to quality of room, free breakfast, great location. Bed was comfy, room was clean. Will definitely stay here again. 

It was friends bday & they took the time to have a cupcake, candle & balloons  in the room-extra special!

title: Très bel Hotel Time Square
text: Hotel de qualité et très bien situé au cœur de Mid-Town à deux pas de Broadway. Je recommande cet hôtel pour les couples qui souhaitent découvrir New-York. Personnel sympathique et à l’écoute. Les chambres ne sont pas très bien insonorisées et le ménage nécessite de plus de précision.

title: Great lodging nearest Broadway theatres
text: We spent Saturday night at the hotel  prior to  2:00 PM Sunday  show, Beautiful, at the Stephen Sondheim Theatre on 43rd Street. Holiday Inn complimentary breakfast is always good to start the day. The ability to check our luggage in the hotel lobby so as not to be hampered with it for the show or dinner after at Carmines's  after the show was great!

title: Just Right.
text:
I always find this hotel the right place to come to. 
The front desk staff are brilliant. From Henry, Carl, Melissa, Jornie, Annie...just great. They are ALWAYS there to help and check me in swiftly. 
The rooms are just the right size for what you pay for. 
The hotel is always clean. 
Breakfast is ok. Theresa makes the cramped space where breakfast takes place work for everyone. She is always helpful. 
The one down side I would say about this place is that in the morning their is ALWAYS a wait for the elevators. The housekeeping staff are using one if the two elevators. I have waited over 7-8  mins to even get into the elevator, than if I am on a high floor, it takes several mins to reach the ground floor. 
But, all in all a great location, well priced, and JUST RIGHT for most needs.

title: Près de Times Square
text:
'la station geographique est tres pratique et au centre de ville.La chambre et le bathroom sont fonnctionnels,le lit king size est tres comfortable.le petit dejeuner est delicieux. Le personnel est gentil et aimable.
Par contre leş ascenceurs sont full et le salon du petit dejeuner est tres petit donc tres vite crowded.
Enfin nous étions contents de notre séjour.

title: Superbe emplacement
text:
L'hôtel est idéalement placé à 10mn à pied de Times Square.
Le métro le plus proche (ligne A) est à 5mn à pied.
Les chambres du 30ème etage dispose d'une superbe vue sur Empire State Building.
La chambre est propre.

Je recommande

title: Great location, smallish rooms.
text:
A haven from the crazy streets of New York.  We arrived into Penn station and it was about a 10 to 15 minutes walk with suitcases.  Quicker to walk than take a cab! 
The room was on the small side, with a view of the city. Comfortable bed. Crowded buffet breakfast, but it works. You may have to wait for a table at peak times.  The lifts are a problem, but not a game changer.  Tip: if you're on a higher floor waiting to go down, press both the down and up buttons. You may have to go up to the 36th, but it's quicker than waiting for a lift with enough space.
We stayed 4 nights, getting back about 4 or 5 pm before going out in the evening.  A couple of times, we had to wait half an hour for room service to complete their clean. 
A lot of external noise overnight, but it is New York!
Helpful, professional staff.

title: All the right stuff.
text:
This hotel is conveniently located for theatre goers and sightseers alike. While the rooms are a little small and the elevators congested at times, the front deck crew were so friendly and helpful - from free cookies to clean towels, they covered it all!  
This hotel also offers a complimentary Buffett breakfast. Busy at times, there were good options ( in our group of four were had a diabetic and some with celiac disease) and the staff working here were so kind and friendly.

title: Yankee Weekend
text: Camera niente male all' 11esimo piano (basso) con vista sul niente!!! Peccato speravo in una vista mozzafiato senza grandi soddisfazioni! Hotel è proprio a Wall Street ed i prezzi sono in linea col quartiere! Davvero strategico

title: A MOINS DE 10 mn à pied de TIMES SQUARE
text: HOTEL PROCHE DE TIMES SQUIRE MOINS DE 10 mn à pieds. CHAMBRE EXIGUE on a pu à peine ranger nos valises (chambre 2 lits) dont l'un touchait le mur de la fenêtre. Confort simple. Personnel étranger (mexicain, etc.... ne parlant pas français, et à peine "anglais" faut savoir s'expliquer en espagnol, sinon serviable et gentil. Le grand problème, la salle du PDJ se trouve en sous-sol et est très petite avec seulement 3 ou 4 petites tables rondes (donc ne pas arriver à une heure d'affluence sinon vous déjeunerez debout), PDJ correct mais sans plus (oeufs durs, gauffres, fruits).

title: Cheaper is not always better
text: The rooms are tiny and there are only 2 small elevators for a hotel with 36 floors.  The elevators were always full and it took over an hour to get one with enough space for our family member in a wheelchair and another 30 minutes to be able to take down the luggage cart to leave.  Parking prices were $70 a day!  We saw numerous lots for far less than that per day.  It took an hour for the valet to retrieve our vehicle.  The next block over is sketchy at night with drug use and fighting.  There are not smoke detectors in the rooms.  You have to ask for a portable on at the front desk!  We had a good view though.  Breakfast was decent and the staff was friendly and informative.  Chris and Anthony, in particular.

title: 価格なりのホテルでしょう
text:
私が滞在した2017年9月後半から10月前半にかけてホテル前面が工事中でした。
そのため、前面道路がものすごい渋滞をしていました。
特にW 39th streetはリンカーン・トンネルへの接続道でもあるので朝夕はものすごく混雑して、かつ工事車両の行き来で都度道路交通を止めたりしていた関係でタクシーを拾うのに数ブロック歩かないといけない事態になっていました。荷物が多くなるこれから冬場の旅行などは重量のあるスーツケースなどを持って移動するのは大変に感じる方もおられるかと思います。

アメニティは記載通りでルームクリーンは毎日入って頂け、その都度アメニティを補充して頂けたのは良かったです。

広さはダブルベッド2台でしたがスーツケース2個を平置き開放出来ないスペースです。結局ベッド1台を荷物載せスペースに使いました。

バスタブは湯をためることは出来ますが、使用した部屋は排水溝の栓が壊れていてためることが出来ず、シャワーのみで対応しました。湯温は暑くまでできて水量も十分確保できていました。

部屋の設備としてWifiはもちろん、有線インターネット接続もあるので情報収集には困りません。有線は無線の10倍以上の速度が出ていたので接続できるのであれば有線接続がお勧めです。ロビーには白黒プリンター付きのPCが2台ありますが、英語版サービス、英字キーボードですので日本語での入力、変換は困難です。

朝食はほぼ毎日同じ物の提供でしたが6時台から7時台の間に行かないと食べるものの種類がどんどん減っていき9時台近くになると補充も疎かになってきます。
座席も少なく、ロビーまで持って行ったり部屋に持ち帰る必要が出てきてしましますがエレベーターも高階層まであるのに2機しかなく、ルームクリーンも早い時間から入るので清掃員さんが移動するために使うこともあり40階近い階層から各フロアに停止するのでとんでもなく時間が掛かります。通勤ラッシュみたいな感覚になります。

また、料金が上乗せされる良眺望の部屋(City View)を予約しましたが写真もアップしましたが高層建築物が少し見える程度。他の部屋を利用したわけでは無いですが通常の部屋を予約しても良かったと思います。

次回利用するかと聞かれれば他が空いてなければという選択になりそうです。

title: Convenient hotel
text: I booked the hotel from Trip advisor reviews and glad I did. Pros: close to Times Square about 5 blocks less than half a mile, a little farther from Broadway theaters about 15 to 20 minute brisk walk. There are dining places everywhere, some open 24 hours. There's Grays Papaya across the streer, pizza places, Kungfu Chinese restaurant. Hells kitchen is within 5 minutes walk. The room is large for New York standards and the double bed room was spacious and contains a bathroom with tub. The beds are super comfortable. There is a Keurig machine, no refrigerator, there is a safe. Toiletries are Bath and Body Works. The view is ok, buildings. You can hear the street but noise is manageable. The staff is friendly. Breakfast is basic-omelettes,fruit, bread,yogurt,juice,coffee,tea, sausage,biscuits and gravy,cinnamon rolls,and the pancake making machine is amazing. The space was super small but the staff did their best to seat people. You can always take the food back to your room or eat at the main lobby table. My sister and I decided to eat breakfast between 730 and 745 am and this worked,since at 8 everyone arrives at the same time. There is a microwave and water machine in the breakfast room. The elevators are slow in the am and sometimes only 1 is working so this is the definite con,but we were not in a hurry since we planned our schedule to leave earlier if we have to meet a reservation. Used a Lyft from the airport to this hotel about $60, Port authority is about a 5 min to 10 min walk if commuting.

title: Well located
text: Super well located. Free wifi. Parking next street. Discount for customers. Clean. There is a bar in the building. Small room but you are downtown downtown so you are not expecting super huge room. Was perfect for a weekend. Do recommend

title: wonderful location and stay
text: used this for personal trip and it was wonderful. rooms are small yet that is NYC so doesn't bother. It was one block from main artery so made it simple to get around. the food around was outstanding: mercato was the best italian ever. we were close to the theatre area and much more. I would high recommend. it does have morning breakfast but we missed it for something else they did give us a meal to take with us and it was fine.

title: Great Place to stay in NYC
text: All the Staff were fantastic, especially Anna on the front desk. So helpful and always greeting you with a smile. Great location and rooms were good, although a small fridge would have been good to have. Would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Very centraly located inexpensive hotel
text:
We booked online and following a review from trip advisor.
We booked a room a little higher as suggested and were pleased with the view.
The front desk was very well run and pleased to provide service to us.
The elevators were ok and we did not have a problem .
The room was very nice and was small but who cares as we spent all of the time out exploring.
Free breakfast was ok and the staff were very friendly, on Sunday we opted for a diner  around the corner.
Checkout was excellent . We always prepay as less hassle .
The hotel is so central that we walked all the time, Times Square , Central park , the Met, the majestic theatre in broadway.
It was located in the garment district and were able to walk to Lord and Taylor as well as my favourite Cockpit Store was across the street and bought one of the famous bomber A1 .

title: New York at Christmas
text: Great hotel in a good location!  The hotel was within walking distance of most of the sites my family and I wanted to see.  The staff was friendly and helpful when answering our travel questions.  The room was clean and met all our expectations.  NYC is a great place to visit during the Christmas season!

title: Excelente hotel
text: Hotel muito bom, pertinho da Times Square e ao lado da Macy's e do Empire State. Perto também de várias estações de metrô e da estação de trem Penn Station (pra quem tem interesse de fazer um bate e volta pra Washington, fica muito fácil de ir pra essa estação de trem, pois dá pra ir andando). O quarto do hotel é muito aconchegante, possui uma das camas mais confortáveis que já dormi em hotel. Colchão muito fofinho e com quatro travesseiros em cada cama. Banheiro limpo e moderno. O único porém do quarto é que o que eu fiquei não possui frigobar, apenas uma cafeteira, mas dá pra sobreviver tranquilamente sem esse detalhe. O café da manhã é razoável, achei que não tem muitas opções, mas diante da culinária pouco atrativa dos americanos, acho que tava até bom (definitivamente, no item café da manhã, os hotéis brasileiros dão show). A equipe do hotel super educada e prestativa, sempre prontos a atender você. Tem até alguns que falam espanhol e português, o que ajuda bastante. Recomendo bastante esse hotel e da próxima vez que eu for a Nova York, ficarei novamente nele com certeza.

title: Convenient Location
text: Made reservations online a month in advanced. Selected hotel based on location & rewards. Learned upon arrival that you do not earn any IHG points through 3rd party. My luck, lost 4 nights worth reward points. Grrrr. Regardless of my loss, front desk was helpful & courteous. Room had a flat screen tv and a sofa chair. Loud aircon with settings on the wall. Bathroom was small. The king size bed was comfy. Took stairs from 8th floor as the wait time for elevator took a while. It's where i discovered security guard in stairway. Continental breakfast was simple; eating area had limited room due to large crowd in mornings. My room served it's purpose (to shower & sleep). Hotel is 3 blocks from 42nd street.The location was convenient.

title: Lots of stairs
text: The front desk at this hotel was exceptional.  Ericka did a great job getting us in our room very early.  This is a very tall hotel with only two elevators so plan to either wait awhile or use the stairs.  The location is perfect for walking all over Manhattan.  There room was clean and cozy.  There restaurant connect with the hotel is extremely busy also so the theme is patience.  Nice place.

title: Love this place
text: I just love this hotel.  Not brand-spanking new or anything but the location is perfect.  The room is clean.  The breakfast cannot be beat.  Best free breakfast in New York City.  Personnel at this hotel are always welcoming.

title: Buen trato, gran ubicación.
text:
Nuestra  experiencia en este hotel  fue muy satisfactoria.  La ubicación es excelente  a una manzana del Word  Trade Cente y a un minuto de una estación de metro. 
La cama supercomoda,  las vistas espectaculares,  el desayuno mejorable.
En recepción nos atendió  Joe, siempre guardaremos un gran recuerdo de el, por su ayuda, paciencia, disposición  y amabilidad.  
Muy recomendable.

title: Ótima surpresa!
text:
O quarto era pequeno, mas servia perfeitamente. Incrível localização. Todos os funcionários eram incrivelmente simpáticos. Pequeno almoço muito completo. Apesar do reduzido espaço para tomar o pequeno almoço, permitiam levar o pequeno almoço para o quarto e tentavam acomodar toda a gente da melhor forma. Café e chá gratuito durante todo o dia.
Pouco profissionalismo das empregadas de limpeza (deixaram a luz e televisão acesa e um pano de limpeza esquecido, deixavam sempre menos toalhas do que as suposto, por vezes não renovavam o gel de banho,...).

title: Correct et " pratique"
text:
Hôtel très "convenable" pour un court séjour car la chambre est petite, l'unique placard minuscule .Emplacement centre ville très pratique pour se balader à pieds ou metro, chambre très propre, insonorisée, literie parfaite, personnel disponible et aimable(Juan particulièrement)
Il faut être matinal pour avoir une place dans la salle petit déjeuner et éviter l'embouteillage aux 2 ascenseurs
Le petit dejeuner americain comme prevu dans la brochure de mon agence de voyage se limite a cafe ( jus de chaussette)ou thé , 3 panecake , un verre de jus d'orange industriel ou omelette pommes de  terre/ jambon  le reste de la carte est  en supplément , nourriture " americaine" bourrative et  sans goût 
Bon plan:  gateaux et viennoiseries délicieuses à " la baguette parisienne", boutique voisine de l'hôtel......😉
La chambre était au 11 ème étage sur l'arrięre donc très calme.

title: Una bella vacanza a ny 10 giorni senza preoccupazioni
text:
Salve sono stata in questo albergo dal 31 agosto al 10 settembre u.s e mi sono trovata davvero bene. Camera al 36^piano con vista mozzafiato che spazia dall'empire state building agli altri grattaceli a 360 gradi. Posizione ottima e centralissima.
Vicina a tutto: dalla metro alla stazione dei bus....
Personale cordiale, anche con chi (come me) non capisce immediatamente la lingua. 
Per la colaziome sturbucks all'angolo e maison de Paris sulla stessa via.
Il mio soggiorno era gia saldato,pertanto non mi sono state trattenuti i 50$ di cauzione.
Pulizia e comodità dei letti (fondamentale) suppliscono il poco spazio delle camere.
Consigliato.

title: Great location.  Poor upkeep.
text: Not wHatbyou would expect from this brand.  The pros to this hotel include its location and location.  Cons include poorly maintained (the hair dryer in our room fell of the wall), lack of a small fridge,  thin and torn towels which were rationed out (we had to call for a bath mat, towels and face washers on our second day as we were only left 2 towels), and a very crowded breakfast area that is definitely not large enough to meet the demands of a hotel this size.  We've stayed at this hotel multiple times in recent years and things continue to deteriorate.  Will probably try somewhere else in the area on our next visit.

title: Average Holiday Inn Express Hotel with Good Location !!!
text:
Positives:
Very good location, walking distance from Times Square

Staff was nice & professional

Breakfast staff was very prompt

Negatives:

Elevators are very busy in the morning, took me 15 minutes to catch an elevator around 10 AM

Saw a roach in breakfast area

Same breakfast menu everyday

title: Localización estupenda
text:
El hotel está en El Centro de Manhattan. Al lado hay un supermercado. Además puedes tener el desayuno incluido y es una opción estupenda porque desayunar fuera, en el típico restaurante neoyorquino puede salirte muy caro y no tendrás la variedad para elegir que tienes en un bufete. 
Como aspecto negativo mencionar que desde las plantas más bajas del hotel en la habitación se oye un zumbido contaste que viene de los sistemas de refrigeración. 
Nosotros estábamos tan cansados que ni lo oíamos. Pero puede resultar molesto. Si tienes posibilidad de escoger, pide plantas altas. Tiene 19 plantas!

title: LOCATION TO TIMES SQUARE EXCELLENT
text: Comfortable accomodation in a relatively good area of NYC. Building obviously renovated in recent years.Close to Times Square and theatre district. Rooms small but comfortable. Reasonable self service breakfast included in price but breakfast room is small and gets very crowded as do the 2 lifts that service the building are very busy between 8.00 and 10.30 am and long waits can be encountered. Clean premises and well maintained. Front desk staff of Henry and Anna provide excellent and courteous service. Access to transportation services (taxi's etc) is good with very little waiting time for Uber/Lyft and other taxi services. A busy hotel that works. Beds are comfortable but storage space in the room for cases etc is a little bit cramped.

title: Clean rooms!
text:
The rooms are clean and the bathroom is very nice! The rooms however is very small. There isnt much space when there is a party of 4 person in a room with all the suitcases. 
The hotel is close to everywhere in Time Square. You can walk to everywhere! The staff is very accommodating and always willing to help. Gr8 choice!

title: Hotel facilities can not handle all guests
text: The location of this hotel is great and the price is not bad. What was disappointing was that there was a lot of waiting involved. We arrived early and put our bag into storage while we went into town. The bellman is shared with two other hotels, so when we returned we had to wait 10-15 minutes for our bag, as the bellman was busy in one of teh other hotels. Leaving the hotel on the Sunday morning involved a 15 minute wait for the elevator. There was a theoretical opportunity for breakfast, but the small restaurant was so full that there was no possibility of seating.o

title: Posizione buona e colazione scadente
text: Ho prenotato in questo hotel perché mi fido della catena Holiday Inn...in effetti i servizi sono stati tutti garantiti ed il personale è gentilissimo e disponibilissimo ...mi aspettavo qualcosa in più dalla posizione: se si fosse trovato sulla 40*/41* sarebbe stata il top (dall'incrocio della 8* con la 39 si incontrava qualche strano personaggio e non vi erano esercizi commerciali nei dintorni!)...la cosa più deludente è stata la colazione: va bene che è inclusa ma è stato raccapricciante vedersi servire omelette e uova strapazzate precotte e fatte con il liofilizzato di colore catarifrangente e consistenza gommosa (neanche in aereo!) ...va bene che gli altri prodotti siano preconfezionati (non ci si aspettavano muffins appena sfornati) ma sulle uova sono rimasta interdetta!

title: Just 2 lifts!!
text:
I chose this hotel due to its close proximity to Port Authority so I could simply walk there in the morning. Check in was a breeze and staff were very friendly and welcoming. However, there were only 2 lifts  and we had to wait for 15 mins or so to get to the room. I know this is NYC and space is premium but 2 lifts for all the hotel rooms? Cmon!!

Beds were really comfortable but I was woken up at 5am due to someone who were using the ice cubes machine at the corridor. I stayed here for one night stay so thank god for that!! :)

PS: Breakfast at the bar was really lovely. Big thumbs up.

title: Excellent
text: We stayed five nights. While the rooms are small they are clean and comfortable. For the price you won't get anything better this close to Times Square and the theatre district. Lots of restaurants nearby. The staff are very friendly and helpful. The breakfast is great with lots of hot and cold choices. Would certainly stay again.

title: Buen Hotel !
text:
La habitación esta muy completa, no es muy grande pero tiene una cama inmensa super confortable.
Esta muy bien situado.
Nos tocó un piso alto por lo que no tuvimos problema de ruidos.
Una muy buena opción!

title: Veldig fint hottel koselig betjening.
text: Veldig fint hottel koselig betjening.Fine rom fikk plas til koffertenerenholdet på rommet .Frokost var med i prisen, veldig littet spise ariale så var trangt om plassen.Grei gange avstand til alle severdigheter.

title: Excelente localização...
text:
Excelente localização, preço honesto com o que oferece! equipe atenciosa!
detalhes: espaço limitado para café da manha, vá mais cedo para ficar tranquilo! elevadores sempre muito disputados! tenha paciencia e aproveite!
Se chegar muito cedo, muito dificil terá um early check in! o meu foi somente após as 15:30 ainda assim com muito insistencia. no check out autorizaram fica até as 14! felizmente! tivemos problemas com os serviços de concierge - simplesmente nao recomendo!!

title: Wedding anniversary in New York
text:
We picked this hotel after our one on 5th Avenue changed hands.
